name: Good Company (itch)
description:
Good Company is a short interactive fiction story about a mobster, Tennant, coming home to his bodyguard/partner, Daniel, with a few complaints in tow. The 'watch a movie' storyline contains explicit sexual content. All storylines contain coarse language & allusions to violence, sex, etc.

Daniel & Tennant belong to Glace Leau, who commissioned this game.
